name: BigCommerce
description: Add a Big Commerce Instance to connect your existing Big Commerce account to the eCommerce Hub, allowing you to manage orders and products across multiple eCommerce Elements. You will need your Big Commerce account information to add an instance.

configuration.name: Authentication Type
configuration.description: For basic authentication  select 'basic' and for OAuth authentication select 'custom'

configuration.name: Bulk Query Created Date/Time Field Name
configuration.description: Bulk Query Created Date/Time Field Name

configuration.name: Bulk Query Date Format
configuration.defaultValue: EEE, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss Z

configuration.name: Bulk Query Last Modified Date/Time Field Name
configuration.description: Bulk Query Last Modified Date/Time Field Name

configuration.name: Max Page Size (or limit)
configuration.description: BigCommerce Beta Max Page Size (or limit)

configuration.name: Allow Select Fields parameter
configuration.description: Enables use of global fields query parameter to filter response to only specified fields. This will override any existing vendor functionality on the connector

configuration.name: API Path
configuration.description: Your Store URL. in the form https://store-.mybigcommerce.com/api/v2/

configuration.name: Filter null values from the response
configuration.description: Used to enable/disable filtering of null values from the responses.

configuration.name: Default select fields
configuration.description: Generic map used to specify default fields for bulk download and GET /all requests. Each key should be the canonical objectName and values may be specified as a comma-delimited string or a list of strings

configuration.name: Event poller refresh interval
configuration.description: Used for how often to poll the application (in minutes)

configuration.name: Event Notification Callback URL
configuration.description: BigCommerce Beta Event Notification Callback URL

configuration.name: Event Poller Resources Configuration
configuration.description: Event Poller Resources Configuration. The configuration is defined via JSON, an example of which is as follows - { "contacts": { "url": "/hubs/helpdesk/contacts", “idField”: “user.id”, “datesConfiguration”: { "updatedDateField": "user.updated_at", "updatedDateFormat": "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssX", “createdDateField”: “user.created_at”, “createdDateFormat": "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssX" }, "pageSize": 10000 } }
configuration.defaultValue: {"orders":{"url":"/hubs/ecommerce/orders?where=min_date_modified='${date:EEE, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss Z}'","idField":"id","datesConfiguration":{"updatedDateField":"date_modified","updatedDateFormat":"EEE, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss Z","createdDateField":"date_created","createdDateFormat":"EEE, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss Z"}},"products":{"url":"/hubs/ecommerce/products?where=min_date_modified='${date:EEE, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss Z}'","idField":"id","datesConfiguration":{"updatedDateField":"date_modified","updatedDateFormat":"EEE, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss Z","createdDateField":"date_created","createdDateFormat":"EEE, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss Z"}},"customers":{"url":"/hubs/ecommerce/customers?where=min_date_modified='${date:EEE, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss Z}'","idField":"id","datesConfiguration":{"updatedDateField":"date_modified","updatedDateFormat":"EEE, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss Z","createdDateField":"date_created","createdDateFormat":"EEE, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss Z"}}}

configuration.name: Callback Notification Signature Key
configuration.description: A key used to generate a validation hash header of the event/bulk notification webhook callback payload

configuration.name: Bulk Native File Format
configuration.description: Used for defining type of bulk download file format

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number. Defaults to 1 if not provided

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The page size. Defaults to 200 if not provided. Maximum of 5000

custom_status.description: Contains the same string value as the Order Statuses object's custom_label property

external_source.description: For orders submitted or modified via the API, using a PUT or POST operation, you can optionally pass in a value identifying the system used to generate the order

ip_address.description: IP Address of the customer, if known

is_deleted.description: Indicates whether the order was deleted (archived)

items_shipped.description: The number of items that have been shipped

items_total.description: The total number of items in the order

order_is_digital.description: Whether this is an order for digital products

order_source.description: Orders submitted via the store's website will include a www value. Orders submitted via the API will be set to external

payment_provider_id.description: The external Transaction ID/Payment ID within this order's payment provider (if a payment provider was used)

products.description: Array of product objects that make up the order.

refunded_amount.description: The amount refunded from this transaction

shipping_cost_inc_tax.description: The value of shipping cost, including tax

status.description: The status will include one of the string values defined under Order Statuses

total_sold.description: Total quantity of this product sold through transactions.

upc.description: The product UPC code, which is used in feeds for shopping comparison sites

view_count.description: The number of times the product has been viewed

warranty.description: Warranty information displayed on the product page

weight.description: Weight of the product, which can be used when calculating shipping costs

width.description: Width of the product, which can be used when calculating shipping costs

productsPatchResp.description: A product object represents a saleable item in the catalog

availability_description.description: Availability text, displayed on the checkout page under the product title, telling the customer how long it will normally take to ship this product

avalara_product_tax_code.description: Accepts AvaTax System Tax Codes, which identify products and services that fall into special sales-tax categories.

bin_picking_number.description: The BIN picking number for the product

calculated_price.description: Price as displayed to guests, adjusted for applicable sales and rules

categories.description: An array of IDs for the categories this product belongs to

condition.description: The product's condition.Will be shown on the product page if the value of the is_condition_shown field is true

cost_price.description: The product's cost price. Stored for reference only,not used or displayed anywhere on the store

custom_url.description: Custom URL (if set) overriding the structure dictated in the store's settings

date_created.description: The date of which the product was created
date_created.x-mask: EEE, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss Z

date_last_imported.description: The date on which the product was last imported using the bulk importer
date_last_imported.x-mask: EEE, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss Z

date_modified.description: The date that the product was last modified
date_modified.x-mask: EEE, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss Z

depth.description: Depth of the product, which can be used when calculating shipping costs.

description.description: Product description, which can include HTML formatting.

downloads.description: Total number of downloads for a downloadable product

event_date_end.description: When the product requires the customer to select an event/delivery date,this date is used as the 'before' date
event_date_end.x-mask: EEE, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss Z

event_date_field_name.description: Name of the field to be displayed on the product page when selecting the event/delivery date

event_date_start.description: When the product requires the customer to select an event/delivery date, this date is used as the 'after' date
event_date_start.x-mask: EEE, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss Z

fixed_cost_shipping_price.description: A fixed shipping cost for the product. If defined, this value will be used instead of normal shipping-cost calculation during checkout

height.description: Height of the product, which can be used when calculating shipping costs.

id.description: The unique numerical ID of the product. Increments sequentially

inventory_level.description: Current inventory level of the product. Simple inventory tracking must be enabled

inventory_tracking.description: the type of inventory tracking for the product

inventory_warning_level.description: Inventory Warning level for the product. When the product's inventory level drops below this warning level, the store owner will be sent a notification. Simple inventory tracking must be enabled

is_condition_shown.description: Flag used to determine whether the product's condition will be shown to the customer on the product page.

is_featured.description: Flag to determine whether the product should be included in the 'featured products' panel for shoppers viewing the store

is_free_shipping.description: Flag used to indicate whether or not the product has free shipping

is_open_graph_thumbnail.description: If set to true, the product thumbnail image will be used as the open graph image

is_preorder_only.description: If set to false, the product will not change its availability from preorder to available on the release date. Otherwise, on the release date the product's availability/status will change to available

is_price_hidden.description: The default false value indicates that this product's price should be shown on the product page.

is_visible.description: Flag to determine whether or not the product should be displayed to customers browsing.

layout_file.description: The layout template file used to render this product category

meta_description.description: Custom meta description for the product page

meta_keywords.description: Custom meta keywords for the product page

open_graph_description.description: Description to use for the product

option_set_display.description: The position on the product page where options from the option set will be displayed

option_set_id.description: The ID of the option set applied to the product

options.description: Options from the option set applied to the product

order_quantity_maximum.description: The maximum quantity an order can contain when purchasing the product

order_quantity_minimum.description: The minimum quantity an order must contain in order to purchase this product

page_title.description: Custom title for the product's page

preorder_message.description: Custom expected-date message to display on the product page

preorder_release_date.x-mask: EEE, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss Z

price_hidden_label.description: If is_price_hidden is true, the value of price_hidden_label will be displayed instead of the price.

primary_image.description: An image object, corresponding to the image that is set as the product's thumbnail

rating_count.description: The total number of ratings the product has had

rating_total.description: The total rating for the product

related_products.description: Defaults to -1, which causes the store to automatically generate a list of related products

retail_price.description: The product's retail cost. If entered, this retail price will be shown on the product page

rules.description: Rules that apply only to this product, based on the product's option set

sale_price.description: Sale price. If entered, this will be used instead of value in the price field when calculating the product's cost
